text: Justin Gimelstob and Sébastien Lareau were the defending champions, but none competed this year. Alex O'Brien and Jared Palmer won the title by defeating Andre Agassi and Sargis Sargsian 7–5, 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== The top four seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw (ATP) * Qualifying Draw (ATP) Legg Mason Tennis Classic Doubles Category:Washington Open (tennis)
title: 2000 Legg Mason Tennis Classic – Doubles
